thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: John

author: John
title: John
text: I enjoy Thrift Books so much! The books are extremely affordable, they arrive quickly, and they have always been in great condition. It has really help me build up my library of books I want in hard cover, because I can get hard cover editions for a great price. They have excellent book choices, current and otherwise! They also offer a lot of incentive deals like the rewards program. Plus the free shipping for purchases over ten dollars is wonderful!
